title: How to Draw a Cute Cartoon Cat

steps.title: Draw the shape of the head.
steps.content: Draw the shape of the head. This shape can vary. You could make it fluffy-looking by adding ear tufts, or maybe adding a swirly spiral of hair, etc.

steps.title: Draw in the eyes, as seen in the image.
steps.content: Draw in the eyes, as seen in the image. These are in a sort of anime style, as they are much easier then drawing actual cat eyes. They also make the cat look much more cute.

steps.title: Add in the facial features such as the nose, mouth, whiskers, and color in the eyes black.
steps.content: Add in the facial features such as the nose, mouth, whiskers, and color in the eyes black. Be creative! Maybe add little fangs to the mouth, or a fishtail? Or how about squiggly whiskers if you were drawing a tough cat or an alley cat?

steps.title: Draw a collar, a body and legs.
steps.content: Draw a collar, a body and legs. Once again, creativity is the key. Especially the collar. A tough kitty could have skulls and fish bones. A sweet kitty could have flowers and hearts. Finally, a fancy kitty could have lots and lots of diamonds!

steps.title: Add the tail, back legs and more detail to the paws.
steps.content: Add the tail, back legs and more detail to the paws. You could make the tail scruffy to give it an "alley cat" look or fluffy, as if it were a "fancy kitty".

steps.title: Add detail such as claws and patterns to the tail and face.
steps.content: Add detail such as claws and patterns to the tail and face. Spots, stripes, etc.

steps.title: Add color and you are done!
steps.content: Add color and you are done! But you don't have to be. Draw a garden in the background or a simple food bowl, or whatever you can think of.
